data.title: Responsive UIs
data.heading: Jeppesen:'A Boeing Company'
data.content: Shown: The Ground Controls web based application creates mission critical navigation charts for commercial airlines. This responsive, Angular based project, can be used on either an extremely large screen or a hand held device. Crew are able to add legs to a flight via Material Components. The challenge was updating PrimeFaces components to Material design components, and working with various grid systems to create natural breakpoints. The video at the below link 21-35 seconds, shows the UI that I  built in use.

data.title: Look and Feel
data.heading: Chase Bank
data.content: Shown: Digital Gaming. Unique customer base for the bank, needed an eye-catching landing page that reflected the gaming industry. Working with Data Analysts, back end developers and Marketing, other projects at Chase included skinning legacy applications and building new UIs.

data.title: Planning | Systems Design
data.heading: Intelligent Software Solutions
data.content: Shown: Architecture design proposal for Alerting and Notifications. Created visualizations for data UIs for real-time military incident response reporting software, actively deployed around the world. Projects focused around software to human interaction. Wireframed, designed and built many dashboards using HTML / CSS / JavaScript across platforms and browsers, and organizational silos, to create new applications with shared UI components. Top Secret Clearance, DoD.
